mapper.select: /* 수집건수 */ /* down_countsCollected */ SELECT DATE(b.regdate) AS date, sum(b.cnt) as cnt FROM ( select a.idx, a.regdate, 1 as cnt from ( select ism.idx, st.regdate from sched_trigger st inner join items_sched_mapping ism on ism.sc_id = st.sc_id inner join items it on it.idx = ism.idx where DATE(st.regdate) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{sdate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE(st.regdate) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{edate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and st.type = 'C' and st.stat in ('S','F') group by ism.idx ) a ) b GROUP BY date

/* 추출건수 */ /* down_countsAnalyzed */ SELECT DATE(b.regdate) AS date, sum(b.cnt) as cnt FROM ( select a.idx, a.regdate, 1 as cnt from ( select ism.idx, st.regdate from sched_trigger st inner join items_sched_mapping ism on ism.sc_id = st.sc_id inner join items it on it.idx = ism.idx where DATE(st.regdate) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{sdate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE(st.regdate) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{edate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and st.type = 'A' and st.stat in ('S') group by ism.idx ) a ) b GROUP BY date

/* 승인건수 */ /* down_countsTagged */ /* SELECT DATE(a.regdate) AS date, sum(a.cnt) as cnt FROM ( select ik.idx, ik.regdate, 1 as cnt from items_tags_keys ik where DATE(ik.regdate) >= STR_TO_DATE('', '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE(ik.regdate) <= STR_TO_DATE(''}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND ik.stat = 'S' group by ik.idx ) a GROUP BY date */ select count(*) as cnt, date1 as date, type, stat from ( select count(*), substr(regdate, 1,10) as date1, type, stat, idx from items_hist where type = 'meta' and stat = 'S' and DATE(regdate) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{sdate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE(regdate) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{edate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') group by substr(regdate, 1, 10), type, stat, idx ) a group by a.date1, a.type, a.stat;

/* getCountItemsHistByType */ select type, stat, count(*) as cnt from items_hist where type in ( 'collect', 'analyze', 'meta' ) and regdate >= STR_TO_DATE(#{sdate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and regdate <= STR_TO_DATE(#{edate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') group by type, stat

/* getCountsItemsStatByStat */ select count(*) as cnt, stat from items_stat where regdate >= STR_TO_DATE(#{sdate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and regdate <= STR_TO_DATE(#{edate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') group by stat

/* getCountsItemsByStatUniq */ select type,stat,count(*) as cnt from ( select type, stat, idx from items_hist where type in ('collect', 'analyze', 'meta') and regdate >= STR_TO_DATE(#{sdate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and regdate <= STR_TO_DATE(#{edate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') group by type, stat, idx ) a group by a.type, a.stat
